config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration CONSTRAIN_SCRIPT_ORIGIN is used to determine whether to constrain the origin of a script. If the configuration is set to true, the script origin will be constrained, otherwise it will be relaxed.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration CONSTRAIN_SCRIPT_ORIGIN is triggered whenever the getScriptSecurity method is called with the constrainOrigin variable being set to true or false.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the CONSTRAIN_SCRIPT_ORIGIN configuration option is that it affects the security settings for scripts in the system. If set to true, it enforces stricter security measures by constraining the script origin, while if set to false, it allows for more relaxed security measures.
